item.description: Our December 14 speaker will be Arthur Venditti of The Product Development Network , who has a lifetime of experience inventing, developing, and licensing products - both his own and others. Many of his products have been in the toy industry. In recent years he has devoted much of his energy toward product sourcing in China. Arthur last spoke to the IANE in March of 2008. Arrive as early as 6:30 to network with others. The meeting starts promptly at 7:00. A map of MIT showing the meeting location is at http://whereis.mit.edu/?selection=4&Buildings=go. Street parking is suggested on Ames Street, Vassar Street or Memorial Drive. Most MIT buildings have easy access and are interconnected.
item.name: Inventors Association of New England December Meetup
